backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented frontend features, associated files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary map describing the purpose of key frontend source files and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, design tokens, and light/dark industrial-themed color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and global SEO metadata for the Built Rite Creations site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application configuring TanStack Router routes for all pages and rendering them within the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying contact details, service links, navigation shortcuts, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with branding, desktop and mobile navigation menus, and a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing a consistent page structure with header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: React hook that sets and restores the document title with a Built Rite Creations suffix for SEO.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status state using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing for this static marketing site.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, light and dark color themes, typography rules, and utility classes for the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with a hero section, mission statement, and values grid using reusable UI components and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a Contact page with a hero section, contact form state handling, and company contact information using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery page with a hero section, grid of sample project cards, and a call-to-action linking to the contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the home page layout including hero, mission, and feature sections that highlight services and link to key routes.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Defines the Services page with a hero section and a grid of cards describing laser cleaning services, using shared UI components and setting the document title to "Services".
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors via CSS variables, typography, container queries, animations, fonts, shadows, and dark mode for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project metadata and requirements, describing the goal to recreate and rebrand precisionlasernw.com as "Built Rite Creations" with a responsive, themed frontend site.
